interface.name: yam_domtrans
interface.summary: Execute yam in the yam domain.

interface.name: yam_run
interface.summary: Execute yam in the yam domain, and allow the specified role the yam domain.

param.name: role
param.summary: The role to be allowed the yam domain.

param.name: terminal
param.summary: The type of the terminal allow the yam domain to use.
